channel.title: K Means on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in K Means on My New Hugo Site

item.title: K-Means Clustering in JavaScript
item.description: Clustering is grouping of data or dividing a large data set into smaller data sets of some similarity. A well known clustering algorithm in unsupervised machine learning is K-Means clustering. The K-Means algorithm takes in n observations (data points), and groups them into k clusters, where each observation belongs to a cluster based on the nearest mean (cluster centroid). The distance between a data point and cluster centroid is calculated using the Euclidean distance.
